H0.text: In 2002, Chechen terrorists took more than 700 people as hostages in Moscow, what type of building were they in. Hotel

H1.text: In 2002, Chechen terrorists took more than 700 people as hostages in Moscow, what type of building were they in. Stadium

H2.text: In 2002, Chechen terrorists took more than 700 people as hostages in Moscow, what type of building were they in. Museum

H3.text: In 2002, Chechen terrorists took more than 700 people as hostages in Moscow, what type of building were they in. Theatre

A4.text: The Moscow theater hostage crisis, also known as the 2002 Nord-Ost siege, was the seizure of the crowded Dubrovka Theater in Moscow by Chechen terrorists on 23 October 2002.
